hero_description: Join thousands of European businesses banking with VERCUL
multi_currency_desc: Hold and manage multiple currencies with competitive exchange rates
real_time_analytics_desc: Track expenses and manage cash flow with powerful insights
bank_security_desc: Your funds are protected with advanced security measures
step_1_desc: Fill out the online form with your business details
step_2_desc: Our team reviews your application within 24-48 hours
step_3_desc: Receive your account details and €500 bonus
testimonial_1: VERCUL has transformed how we manage our international payments. The platform is intuitive and the support is exceptional.
testimonial_2: Best business banking solution we've used. The multi-currency feature alone has saved us thousands in fees.
faq_a1: Most applications are reviewed within 24-48 hours. Complex cases may take up to 5 business days.
faq_a2: You'll need business registration documents, proof of address, and identification for company directors.
faq_a3: VERCUL Business accounts have no monthly fees for the first year. After that, it's just €9.99/month.
faq_a4: We currently serve businesses registered in the UK, Ireland, France, Germany, Spain, Italy, Netherlands, and Belgium.
join_thousands: Join thousands of businesses already banking with VERCUL
confirmation_sent: We've sent a confirmation email to
track_status: You can track your application status using the link below
application_not_found: Application not found. Please check your Application ID.
no_application_id: Don't have your Application ID? Check your confirmation email.
status_submitted_desc: Application received and logged in our system
status_in_review_desc: Our team is reviewing your application and documents
status_action_required_desc: We need additional information from you
status_approved_desc: Account setup and welcome email sent
status_declined_message: Unfortunately, we are unable to approve your application at this time. If you have questions, please contact our support team.
enter_password: Enter your admin password to access the dashboard
add_notes: Add internal notes about this application...
